material: This item is completely made out of GOTS certified organic cotton.
productShortDescription:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
fit:
The pants have a slim fit. Alexander wears size 38women/ 48men in TALL and is 187cm.

36/46(-tall): hips max.* 91cm, Inseam leg 67cm (77cm)

care: Wash this piece on max 40°C, don’t bleach it, let it line dry, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
production:

additionalNotes: The short is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 1- 3 days on average.
